commit.message:
Restore overviewpage (put transactions back within frame)

- Also, change "(out of sync)" to only red, instead of red and bold, which a bit more subtle
- Move label stylesheets to xml

files.patch:
@@ -24,120 +24,141 @@

        </property>

+            </property>
+           </spacer>
+          </item>
+         </layout>
